name: Peewee Piranha
description: smaller form of Dino Piranha with the egg on its butt
attack: Running quickly into Mario
other_features: gets angry and runs faster after Mario destroys the egg once

name: Giga Lakitu
description: giant Lakitu throwing multiple Spinies at once
attack: Throwing spinies, electricity
weakness: throws Spinies at the same spot initially and moves lightning in the same line
other_features: moves a lot faster after the 2nd hit

name: Digga-Leg
description: Giant Digga with legs and a cage with the star under it
attack: Hops around the planet 2 or 3 times in different directions, sends out Diggas directly across from it
weakness: Pauses after throwing Diggas and bouncing around a few times

name: Gobblegut
description: Giant moving dragon with 6 bellyache bulges
attack: Goes into the ground where Mario stands
weakness: moves slower and goes after Mario less before you destroy 3 of its bellyache bulges

name: Mandibug Stack
description: Stack of a normal mandibug and a baby mandibug
attack: Charges at Mario
other_features: Moves faster after the first ground pound

name: Rollodillo
description: Giant armadillo monster
attack: Rolls to crush Mario and turns around quickly
weakness: Rolls in one direction so you can easily sidestep its attacks
other_features: After rolling and turning around once or twice it gets dizzy for about 5 seconds

name: Bowser
description: The King of the Koopas
attack: Punches the planet Mario is on, sends meteors to the planet, moving column of fire
other_features: breathes the column of fire after 2 hits with the meteors

name: Sorbetti
description: Giant snowball monster with snow spikes
attack: Rolls to crush Mario
other_features: Rolls much faster after the 2nd hit

name: Peewee Piranha II
description: smaller form of Dino Piranha with the egg on its butt
attack: Running quickly into Mario
other_features: gets angry and runs faster after Mario destroys the egg once, same features as the first time encountered but you have less time

name: Megahammer
description: Giant Hammer Robot being controlled by Bowser Jr
attack: Shooting bullet and Bonzai Bills, crushing the platform Mario is on using Hammers, sends out electromagnetic pulses
other_features: Has 2 Glass circles on the front and one on the back then Bowser Jr is under a giant glass circle on its head

name: Glamdozer
description: The Queen of the Pupdozers
attack: Charges at Mario, Shoots huge lava balls at Mario
weakness: Huge Ground Pound Symbol under its belly to know where to ground pound it
other_features: Shoots more lava balls after the 3rd ground pound and turns red

name: Gobblegut II
description: Giant moving dragon with 6 bellyache bulges
attack: Goes into the ground where Mario is
weakness: moves slower and goes after Mario less before you destroy 3 of its bellyache bulges
other_features: same as Gobblegut but there's a time limit

name: Bowser II
description: The King of the Koopas II
attack: Punches the planet Mario is on and sends EMP, sends meteors to the planet that send EMPs, moving column of fire that lingers
other_features: same as Bowser but with EMPs and less time to hit Bowser

name: Prince Pikante
description: Giant Octoomba Prince on a Bike?
attack: Shoots fire balls and coconuts in the air, charges at Mario, shoots fire balls and coconuts directly at Mario
other_features: skids across the ice very quickly periodically

name: Squizzard
description: Giant Sand Monster
attack: Throws sand balls and spike balls and bombs at Mario
weakness: opens mouth periodically and ceases attacks
other_features: Sprouts cannons after the 2nd hit then throws bombs

name: Digga-Leg II
description: Giant Digga with legs and a cage with the star under it
attack: Hops around the planet 2 or 3 times in different directions, sends out Diggas directly across from it
weakness: Pauses after throwing Diggas and bouncing around a few times
other_features: same as Digga-Leg but Mario has 1 hit point

name: Boomsday Machine
description: giant moving tower with rotating fire bars
attack: Shoots electric balls at Mario, charges at Mario, electrifies and sucks all clouds into itself
other_features: gets taller and moves around after the 2nd hit

name: Whomp King
description: King of the Whomps and Thwomps
attack: Flattens Mario, summons Pattans to go after Mario
weakness: has ground pound symbol on its back
other_features: after it tries to flatten Mario it stays on the ground for a few seconds, can stomp the ground to immobilize Mario for 3 seconds

name: Bowser III
description: The King of the Koopas III
attack: Punches the planet Mario is on and sends a special EMP, sends meteors to the planet that send EMPs, moving column of fire that lingers, charges at Mario
other_features: same as Bowser II but more meteors, different EMPs, less time to hit Bowser, 2nd section involves just hitting Bowser with meteors while he tries to charget at Mario

name: Megahammer II
description: Giant Hammer Robot being controlled by Bowser Jr
attack: Shooting bullet and Bonzai Bills, crushing the platform Mario is on using Hammers, sends out electromagnetic pulses
other_features: same as Megahammer the first time but Mario has 1 hit point

name: Squizzard II
description: Giant Sand Monster
attack: Throws sand balls and spike balls and bombs at Mario
weakness: opens mouth periodically and ceases attacks
other_features: same as Squizzard the first time but Mario has 1 hit point

name: Boomsday Machine II
description: giant moving tower with rotating fire bars
attack: Shoots electric balls at Mario, charges at Mario, electrifies and sucks all clouds into itself
other_features: same as Boomsday Machine the first time but Mario has 1 hit point

name: Bugaboom
description: giant Mandibug monster that can fly
attack: shoots Bombs at Mario
weakness: Giant ground pound symbol on its back
other_features: turns red and flies around faster and at weird angles after the 2nd ground pound

name: Dino Piranha
description: giant mutant of a piranha plant and dinosaur
attack: Charges at Mario
other_features: moves faster after the 2nd hit

name: Fiery Gobblegut
description: Fiery form of Gobblegut with 6 more bellyache bulges
attack: Goes into the ground where Mario stands, burns Mario, sends Meteors to the planet
weakness: moves slower and goes after Mario less before you destroy 3 of its bellyache bulges
other_features: starts sending lava meteors everywhere after hitting 3 bulges, Mario can be burned by touching it anywhere on the body

name: King Kaliente
description: giant octopus monster in lava
attack: Shoots Fireballs and coconuts, summons lava bubbles
other_features: Summons the lava bubbles after the 2nd hit

name: Major Burrows
description: giant mole boss with a blue spiky helmet
attack: Digs into the ground then charges and spikes Mario
other_features: gets angry and digs faster after the 2nd hit

name: Bouldergeist
description: giant rock poultergeist monster
attack: Throws rocks and Bomb Boos at Mario, punches Mario
other_features: sprouts giant hands after the 3rd hit

name: Fiery Dino Piranha
description: fiery form of Dino Piranha
attack: Charges at Mario, Throws Fire Balls at Mario
other_features: starts spewing fire balls at Mario after the 3rd hit, tail engulfs in flames every couple seconds
